attributes.action: An independent enquiry of the BBC, about their bias EU referendum coverage.
attributes.additional_details:
You only have to look at their Facebook pages to see countless instances where they are continuously peddling EU propaganda.

https://www.facebook.com/bbcdailyandsundaypolitics/?fref=nf

https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews/?fref=ts

These 'stories' they call national news are set out to divide our country at a time when they should be inpartial, and they have shown throughout the debate that they are anything but. 

We want these people removed from their positions, immediately.
attributes.background: Over the past 6 months, it has become increasingly apparent that the BBC have been influenced by their EU paymasters. Their coverage has been heavily in favour of the 'remain' side of the debate, and even after the debate has ended, they have persisted to peddle propaganda and scaremongering.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC Trust is responsible for investigating breaches of the BBC Charter, which includes complaints about the impartiality of the BBC.

You can get in touch with the BBC Trust using the following website:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_us
